word_mean: 环形的，回状的，螺旋状的：扭成环状或螺旋状

sentence.Network_en: Interest rates began to gyrate up towards 20 per cent in 1980 and then down and up again.
sentence.Network_cn: 1980年利率开始攀升至20%，随后又起伏不定。

sentence.Network_en: The woman began to gyrate to the music.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位女子开始随着音乐旋转。

sentence.Network_en: Gyrate The dancers gyrated wildly to the strong beat of the music.
sentence.Network_cn: 跳舞者随着音乐的强烈节奏而猛烈地旋转着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... gyral 旋转的 gyrate 旋涡状的 gyration 旋回.
prospective 未来的，可能的gyrate 旋转，回旋betray （非故意地）暴露，显露
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... guzzle 大吃大喝 gyrate 旋转的；v.旋转 habitat 自然环境，栖息地.
阅读笔记：The&nbsp;Lean&nbsp;and&nbsp;Hungr... ... guffaw 哄笑; 狂笑 gyrate 旋转; 不停地转动 goodly 优秀的; 优美的.

list.abs: 数学词汇英语翻译(F-M) ... guldin rule 古尔丁法则 gyration radius 回转半径 h closed h 闭的.
ferrite frequency meter 铁氧体频率计ferrite gyrator 铁氧体回转器ferrite head 铁氧体磁头
microwave generator 微波发生器microwave gyrator 微波回转器microwave height finder 微波测高器
gypsum cement 石膏水泥gyrating crusher 回转破碎机gyration 回转

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin gyrat- 'revolved', from the verb gyrare, from Greek guros 'a ring'

entry.def: If you gyrate, you dance  or move your body quickly with circular movements.

example.ex: The woman began to gyrate to the music.
example.tran: 这位女子开始随着音乐旋转。

example.ex: ...a room stuffed full of gasping, gyrating bodies.
example.tran: 挤满了气喘吁吁、不停旋转的人的房间

entry.def: To gyrate means to turn round and round in a circle, usually very fast.

example.ex: The aeroplane was gyrating about the sky in a most unpleasant fashion.
example.tran: 飞机在空中盘旋，令人不堪忍受。

entry.tran: （价格、货币等）剧烈波动，起伏不定
entry.def: If things such as prices or currencies gyrate, they move up and down in a rapid and uncontrolled way.

example.ex: Interest rates began to gyrate up towards 20 per cent in 1980 and then down and up again.
example.tran: 1980年利率开始攀升至20%，随后又起伏不定。

means.word_mean: 1. to wind or move in a spiral course;

sentences.sentence: "the muscles and nerves of his fine drawn body were coiling for action"
"black smoke coiling up into the sky"
"the young people gyrated on the dance floor"

means.word_mean: 2. revolve quickly and repeatedly around one's own axis;

sentences.sentence: "The dervishes whirl around and around without getting dizzy"

auth_sentence.content: Behind him a troupe of scantily clad female dancers gyrate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behind him a troupe of scantily clad female dancers gyrate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behind him a troupe of scantily clad female dancers gyrate.

auth_sentence.content: You still might feel queasy when markets gyrate, but that's the point.
auth_sentence.res_content: You still might feel queasy when markets gyrate, but that's the point.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You still might feel queasy when markets gyrate, but that's the point.

auth_sentence.content: Two dancing girls gyrate from a podium, beckoning punters into a nightclub where a band play decked out in shiny blue robes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two dancing girls gyrate from a podium, beckoning punters into a nightclub where a band play decked out in shiny blue robes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two dancing girls gyrate from a podium, beckoning punters into a nightclub where a band play decked out in shiny blue robes.

sentences.en: The young people gyrated on the dance floor.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人在舞池里不停地旋转。

sentences.en: The dancers gyrated to the beat of the music.
sentences.cn: 跳舞者随着音乐的节拍旋转。
